name: Neuron's Adventure
description:
Defend the town from the monsters as you answer their tricking questions about the Nervous System!

Neuron's Adventure is a prototype application from the research project of the Senior High School students of Far Eastern University - Cavite in partial fulfillment of the requirements in Practical Research 2 & Capstone Project

Features:

  • 100% Free to play!
  • 50 items of multiple choice questions
  • 5 Levels covering essential subtopics of the Nervous System
  • Nostalgic 16-bit RPG game design
